summary: This mod add  new race to Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]==============
DESCRIPTION
============
This mod add  new race to Skyrim

[color=red] Highly recommended manual installatio]n[/color]

Vampire [color=red]Diaries[/color] Race :
Vampires are sneaky creatures.They are afraid of sun and silver.
This race was created by Molag Bal who made contract with peoples.
Also there are vampires , who were change into better form by witches. 
Nowadays you can find this vampires and you can meet witches....

Ability:
Evil Form
Vampire Charm

Added to game:
New unique race with their own body and face textures
New Clothes craftable at forge (Different)
New companion Katherine (in Whiterun)
Available 2 unique complexions



[COLOR=RED] UNP IS NOT REQUIRED [/COLOR] 




=============
INSTALLATION 
=============
Setup all files to your data folder

=============[/size]
author: Den987
